cause.description:
Native Americans have been oppressed for hundreds of years and were treated just as poorly as all of the other races in the past. The Native American people deserve far more recognition and this cause has been created for supporting a race who have suffered and never fully been re-payed for it.
1. Native Americans have been oppressed for hundreds of years
2. Hardly any retribution for the acts done to them
3. Still a substantial amount of Native Americans from different heritages alive today
cause.mission: For The World To Remember And Honor The Native American People
cause.name: Support Native Americans
